attributes.action: Ensure that any new road pricing schemes make it easy to separate Business and Personal use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The idea of tracking every vehicle at all times is going to create an administrative burden for small business. Calculating business mileage and collecting receipts for the use of a personal car at work is already too hard.

It will be an unfair burden on small business that are more likely to be using personal cars than having company owned vehicles.

Please Mr Blair – if you must implement road pricing, at least make it easy for small businesses to use.
